name: PR_EST_PX_CVG_ADDL_INFO
description: Contains additional coverage related information for each procedure in a price estimate.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PX_CVG_ADDL_LINE_NUM
columns.description: This item holds a line number of the additional charge info items related group.

columns.name: PX_CVG_FO_NUM
columns.description: The coverage level associated with the corresponding coverage (I PES 168).

columns.name: IS_NON_COVERED_YN
columns.description: This indicates whether a line of an estimate is covered/non-covered.

columns.name: INS_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: This is the insurance allowed amount of the current service line.

columns.name: INS_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This is the insurance paid amount of the current service line.

columns.name: DENTAL_DGRADE_PROC_ID
columns.description: The procedure to which a given line is downgraded for a specific coverage.

columns.name: DENTAL_DGRADE_ALLW_AMT
columns.description: The allowed amount of the downgraded procedure for a given procedure line and coverage.

columns.name: SYS_INS_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the system-calculated insurance paid amount of the current service line.

columns.name: DENTAL_UPGRADE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Upgrade charge amount for given procedure line and coverage.
